attributes.action: The trial of Michael Adebolajo, Michael Adebowale should be live use live court technology.
attributes.additional_details: The trial of Michael Adebolajo, Michael Adebowale has started but not many people would be aware of it, nothing in main stream media, BBC, Sky News, nothing. This trail should be LIVE, the people of the UK should see these men for what they are, total scum. The people should see why these men thought it was acceptable to do, on UK soil.  100'000 signatures needed for this question to be answered LIVE by David Cameron, our leader.
